sentences.en: A good education gives your child a head start in life.
sentences.cn: 良好的教育会让你的孩子在人生的起跑线上比别人领先一步。

sentences.en: After his education, Goldschmidt became a pupil of the composer Franz Schreker.
sentences.cn: 学业结束后，戈尔德施米特成了作曲家弗朗兹·施雷克尔的学生。

sentences.en: Belief in the utility of higher education is shared by students nationwide.
sentences.cn: 全国的学生都相信高等教育是有用的。

sentences.en: Blacks have been hurt by racial inequalities in housing and education.
sentences.cn: 住房与教育方面的种族不平等现象让黑人深受伤害。

sentences.en: Britain did not introduce compulsory primary education until 1880.
sentences.cn: 直到1880年，英国才开始实行初等义务教育。

sentences.en: efforts to improve girls’ access to education
sentences.cn: 为增加女孩受教育机会所作的努力

sentences.en: Funding of education had been grossly inadequate for years.
sentences.cn: 教育资金多年来极为匮乏。

sentences.en: Higher education is being forced to prostitute itself to market forces.
sentences.cn: 高等教育被迫向市场需求妥协。

sentences.en: His privileged bourgeois family insisted on a good education.
sentences.cn: 他那优越的资产阶级家庭坚持让他接受良好的教育。

sentences.en: I think that the underlying problem is education, unemployment and bad housing.
sentences.cn: 我认为深层的问题在于教育、失业和糟糕的住房条件。

sentences.en: Many students are not adequately prepared for higher education.
sentences.cn: 许多学生并未做好接受高等教育的充分准备。

sentences.en: More money should be spent on education and housing.
sentences.cn: 应当在教育和住房方面投入更多的资金。

sentences.en: People need basic education if they are to become employable.
sentences.cn: 想要有人雇用，人们需要接受基础教育。

sentences.en: She also hopes her children will get a good education.
sentences.cn: 她也希望她的孩子可以受到良好的教育。

sentences.en: The college has few ways to assess the quality of education overall.
sentences.cn: 总体看来,这所大学评估教育质量的方法寥寥无几.

sentences.en: The education department has earmarked £6m for the new school.
sentences.cn: 教育部为这所新学校划拨了600万英镑的专款。

sentences.en: Universities are dipping their toes in the waters of management education.
sentences.cn: 各大学正开始尝试进入管理教育领域。

words.tran_cn: 教育家；教育工作者；教师
训练；教导；培育（educate的过去分词形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 远程教育；广播教育，函授教育
n. 初等教育，基本教育（指小学）
高等教育（指含大学以上的教育）

trans.tran_cn: 教育，培养，教育学，教育机构
trans.tran_en: the process of teaching and learning, usually at school, college, or university
